The testdata include two different reference dataset (Nowakowski and Darmanis), and ROS bulk data (n = 10).

```{r setup}
# library(deconv.ensemble)
#devtools::load_all('D:/ensemble deconvolution/deconv.ensemble')
library(foreach)
library(tidyverse)
library(deconv.ensemble)
data(testdata)
```



# Use multiple reference data

```{r}
params = get_params(data_type = "singlecell-rna", data_name = names(testdata$ref_list), n_markers = 50,Marker.Method = "t",TNormalization = "QN",CNormalization = "QN")


res = deconv_wrap(count_bulk = as.matrix(testdata$count_bulk), meta_bulk = testdata$meta_bulk, ref_list = testdata$ref_list, true_frac = testdata$true_frac, outpath ="D:/ensemble deconvolution/test/", ncore = 6, parallel_comp = T, params = params,trueMet = "ROS")
```
